changeSet.author: Rodrigo Nicolas Russillo
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `client` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `full_name` varchar(512) NULL, `dni` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL, `deleted_at` DATETIME(6), `created_at` DATETIME(6), `updated_at` DATETIME(6), `email` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 CHARSET=latin1;
